Michael Leipner

Eickelbornstraße 53a · Lippstadt, 59556 · (+49) 1789088329 · michaelleipner10@gmail.com

Ich mache grade eine 12 monatige Vollzeit-Ausbildung im Bereich Cloud Computing. Inhalte der Ausbildung sind: Grundlagen Cloud-Umgebung, Microsoft Azure, Agile Software-Entwicklung (Scrum), Cloud-Native, Programmierung (go), Cloud Monitoring & Metriken, Performance-Messung, Infrastructure As Code (Terraform & Ansible), Infrastrukturautomatisierung, Continuos Integration & Delivery, Softwarequalitätssicherung.

Interessen

Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid skier and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in Colorado, I enjoy mountain biking, free climbing, and kayaking.

When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.
